derivation: from G303 (ἀναιρέω) and (the active of) G138 (ἀναιρέω);
kjv_def: put to death, kill, slay, take away, take up
strongs_def: to take up, i.e. adopt; by implication, to take away (violently), i.e. abolish, murder
outline:
1. to take up, to lift up (from the ground)
    1. to take up for myself as mine
    2. to own (an exposed infant)
  2. to take away, abolish
    1. to do away with or abrogate customs or ordinances
    2. to put out of the way, kill slay a man
